src:
【直播預告】香港11.9-10反極權反警暴活動

07 Nov 2019, 23:37

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月08日訊】本週末，香港民眾再次發起反極權反暴政活動。週六舉辦「紀念柏林圍牆倒塌30周年集會」，週日將有「屯門牛大遊行」等。新唐人電視台和《大紀元時報》將進行全程追蹤和網絡直播，請鎖定新聞直播間。
香港民眾的抗爭活動至今已近5個月，每週多次集會遊行要求「五大訴求 缺一不可」，但屢屢遭到港警的暴力驅散，迄今超過3000人被捕，還不斷爆出被捕者被虐待、酷刑、性侵等可怕的傳聞，多人死亡被懷疑被自殺，而港府拒絕獨立調查。
本週，民意不斷創新低的香港特首林鄭月娥北上受到中國國家主席習近平和中共常委韓正的接見，其不作為還被肯定，被要求繼續「止暴制亂、恢復秩序」。港人擔憂香港步入黑暗時期。
香港民主黨黨主席胡志偉刊文說，中共以一國牢牢壓著兩制，港人的高度自治空間越來越小，而中共正「將香港從威權帶入極權」。但港人相信「正義或會遲到，總不會缺席」，學生喊出口號「希望在於人民，改變始於抗爭」，「願榮光歸香港」。

週六（11月9日）

【紀念柏林圍牆倒塌30週年集會】時間：15:00-18:00 布置圍牆19:30 集會21:20 推倒圍牆21:30 集會結束地點：中環愛丁堡廣場

週日（11月10日）

【屯門牛大遊行】時間：14:00地點：新和里-新墟-屯門公園-政府合署屯門毒氣 還我真相
大紀元和新唐人網絡直播時間：美東時間：11月9日（週六）凌晨2:00-12:00開始（中港台時間：11月9日15:00-11月9日24:00）美東時間：11月10日（週日）凌晨1:00開始（中港台時間：11月10日14:00開始）

網絡收看方式：

新唐人網站：https://www.ntdtv.com大紀元網站：https://www.epochtimes.com/b5/nf1334917.htm新唐人臉書直播：facebook.com/NTDCHINESE新唐人YouTube直播：youtube.com/user/NTDCHINESE大紀元臉書直播：facebook.com/djy.news大紀元時報-台灣臉書直播：facebook.com/epochtimes.taiwan大紀元新聞頻道：https://www.youtube.com/c/djynews
（責任編輯：李紅）

text:
[Live preview] Hong Kong 11.9-10 anti-polar rights anti-violence activities

07 Nov 2019, 23:37

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 08, 2019] This weekend, the people of Hong Kong once again launched anti-totalitarian anti-tyranny activities. On Saturday, the "Commemoration of the 30th Anniversary of the Collapse of the Berlin Wall" will be held. On Sunday, there will be a "Tuen Mun Bull Parade". NTDTV and The Epoch Times will conduct a full tracking and live webcast. Please lock in the live news room.
The protests of the people of Hong Kong have been in the past five months. The weekly rally has called for "the five major demands are indispensable", but they have been repeatedly violently dispersed by the Hong Kong police. So far more than 3,000 people have been arrested and the arrested people continue to be arrested. A terrible rumor of being abused, tortured, sexually assaulted, many people were suspected of being killed, and the Hong Kong government refused to investigate independently.
This week, Hong Kong Chief Executive Lin Zhengyue, who is constantly innovating in public opinion, was met by Chinese President Xi Jinping and the Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China Han Zheng. His inaction was also affirmed and he was asked to continue to "stop the storm and restore order." Hong Kong people are worried that Hong Kong will enter a dark period.
Hu Zhiwei, chairman of the Democratic Party of Hong Kong, said that the CCP is firmly adhering to the two systems by a country. The Hong Kong people’s high degree of autonomy is getting smaller and smaller, and the CCP is "bringing Hong Kong from authoritarianism to totalitarianism." However, the people of Hong Kong believe that "justice will be late, and they will not be absent." Students yelled at the exit number "Hope is in the people, change begins in the struggle" and "willing to return to Hong Kong."

Saturday (November 9)

[Memorial of the 30th Anniversary of the Collapse of the Berlin Wall] Time: 15:00-18:00 Arrangement of the wall 19:30 Assembly 21:20 Pushing the wall 21:30 End of the meeting: Edinburgh Place, Central

Sunday (November 10th)

[Tuen Mun Cattle Parade] Time: 14:00 Venue: Xinheli-Xinhui-Tuen Mun Park-Government Joint Office Tuen Mun Gas
Epoch Times and NTDTV Live Time: US East Time: Starting at 2:00-12:00 on Saturday, November 9 (September, Hong Kong and Taiwan Time: November 9th, 15:00, November 9th, 24:00) Time: Beginning at 1:00 am on Sunday, November 10 (China, Hong Kong and Taiwan time: 14:00 on November 10)
